website_summaries.verdict: A dermatologist tested formula that's tough on stains but nonirritating to the skin.
pros: Free of potential irritants like dyes and perfumes
Consumers love this formula as an alternative to big name brands
cons: Quite a few complaints of product leaking in transit

customer_reviews.title: but great detergent. it's 2x bottles of 75 fluid ounces ...
customer_reviews.text: misleading product label.... but great detergent. it's 2x bottles of 75 fluid ounces each. Each of these two 75 oz bottles will do 48 loads. So 96 total loads for the purchase of both. NOT 96 loads per bottle like it suggests.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Tide, you better watch your back...
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed by the cleaning power of Persil. I too am a Tide convert. I've used Tide and later Tide pods all of my life. However when the Pods started not to dissolve correctly on my wife's knit pants, I needed to find a better cleaning solution. So I went to my local Walmart and bought a small bottle of Persil to try it out and it worked wonders. I've never been this excited to smell a load of laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: 3rd month in a row... HUGE MESS
customer_reviews.text: I have written Amazon 3x about the liquid detergent destroying the box and EVERYTHING that’s in it. The only option they have given me is to return it... the boxes are saturated w liquid detergent and it’s too much work to get a refund. Save yourself the trouble and don’t order liquid cleaning products from Amazon. A complete waste of time, energy, & money.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with these 2 leaking detergents
customer_reviews.text: First off- we LOVE amazon and we LOVE this detergent. I’ve ordered these detergents countless times before and maybe had only one leak. (And it was so minor that I didn’t even complain) however.. these two came yesterday and both boxes were so soaken through with detergent, that the mail carrier left them on a USPS tray on our porch. Both bottles had leaked and were no longer full and it was a sticky mess. I’m afraid to mail them back- bc the boxes are now flimsy and ruined and the bottles will continue to leak more on the shipment back. Not sure what to do.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but not for online purchase....
customer_reviews.text: This is sort of a dual review. I think this detergent is excellent. I've stepped through a lot of brands and this one consistently works to clean better. I did try a subscription though and that whole thing just inexplicably fell apart. My scheduled order didn't make it and followups didn't seem to have any effect. When I ran out I went to Target who carries this brand. Better price and I don't have to wait for unreliable shipping.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nowlen

customer_reviews.title: Does a fantastic job of getting out stains
customer_reviews.text: Does a fantastic job of getting out stains, even old ones, as well as the mildew-y smell that can harbor in towels. (Funny, I never really had a problem with the towels smelling funny before HE washers. sigh. That's another review for another day.)
customer_reviews.author: C.G.

customer_reviews.title: New Loyal Persil Customer
customer_reviews.text: We used to use Tide, then made our own for a bit, then decided to give Persil a try. WOW! This is amazing detergent! Some of my white t-shirts were starting to get a bit dingy, Persil remedied that. It has a great clean smell - not chemically. This is my new go-to and am 100% loyal to Persil now.
customer_reviews.author: Jim in SoDak

customer_reviews.title: etc and it has cleaned wonderfully.
customer_reviews.text: We previously used another leading brand of detergent, but decided to try Persil after a friend saying it worked well for her. I have used it on work clothes, cloth diapers, play clothes, etc and it has cleaned wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! Good price also. But you really need to work on shipping. I have bought PERSIL 2 times thru my AMAZON PRIME and both times it had leak some out.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Scharbrough

customer_reviews.title: Watch your bottles for lid leaks but great product
customer_reviews.text: We love this brand and buy from AMAZON all the time but this time the lid leaked and as u can see in pictures some leaked out. It happens I didn't think it was enough or worth the hassle to haul it into town to swap out since it was only about half a ounce but I am gonna BITCH cause I earned that right.
customer_reviews.author: Louis E. Bird

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving size! Received a very small container which made it 2x the normal store price!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite detergent. But for over $12 I believe I was getting the regular size bottle I get from the store. Totally wrong! It’s one of the mini sizes you’d get from the corner store and it’s literally the same cost of the larger one. Totally deceived! Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaky packaging!
customer_reviews.text: 100 ounce bottles of this is 11.99 at Target. I did not realize I was ordering 75 ounces which is totally my mistake. Persil is the best laundry detergent you can buy IMO. It’s the only detergent that leaves my husbands work clothes not smelling like work clothes. With that being said, the packaging on this order was terrible. Both bottles leaked out a significant amount. I have ordered from Target countless times and never had one leak. Needless to say, I will order my Persil from Target from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: I have been using Tide since I was a kid. Now I use Persil.
customer_reviews.text: We've been using Tide since I first knew what mom used to get the clothes clean. Tide is still a good product but Persil gets my smelliest, dirtiest clothes cleaner and fresher. Not sure how they managed but they did. Everything looks better and the house even smells nicer on laundry days. I've noticed the difference when I walk in the front door. Try it if you haven't yet. It's definitely worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Mark O.

customer_reviews.title: Leaking bottles!! How does this company survive?
customer_reviews.text: The package delivered to me was saturated with detergent. Both caps leaked. Each of the 2 bottles lost app. a third of its liquid. Only now read reviews seeing this problem existed for at least over a year?!?! Mind numbing to think this company has not corrected this issue after all this time. Congratulations! You've successfully lost a potential customer! (And the detergent is less than impressive. Minimal suds, poor results.)
customer_reviews.author: BluArtz

customer_reviews.title: Allergy to most detergents except this one!
customer_reviews.text: I have a severe allergy to a chemical known as D-MAPA which is found in most detergents and soaps (it is the soaping agent in most products). I even tried All Hypoallergenic and tide Hypoallergenic but they were still not good enough. After many years of searching, I finally stumbled upon Persil and this hypoallergenic product a few months back after a recommendation from a doctor and it finally did the trick! I no longer have any break outs or issues that other detergents cause. If you have sensitive skin to soaping agents; I HIGHLY recommend this product, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Randy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Laundry Detergent
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Persil ever since it became available in the United States, as I remembered seeing it in Europe many years ago. After it arrived in the United States, Consumer Reports tested laundry detergents and gave it the highest ranking. People have routinely complimented the smell of my clothes when I use this (I do not use dryer sheets), so this is now my everyday laundry detergent. I like both, the original as well as Fresh scents, and usually just purchase whichever one I can find the cheapest. I highly recommend this superior detergent.
customer_reviews.author: AKP

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been a tide fan but when my clothes started fading and smelling like metal I decided to try a new laundry soap. This gets my clothes clean, they don’t seem to be fading and no lore metallic scent. I just placed another order for more. I just wish the bottle was designed better because it’s near impossible to get all the soap from the bottle with how the cap is designed.
customer_reviews.author: Madmomx2

customer_reviews.title: This detergent cleans really well!
customer_reviews.text: I really, really like this detergent! This detergent has taken out many stains and always has a fresh scent when washing, and long after. I was skeptical at first about buying detergent from Amazon after reading some of the reviews of others saying that their detergent had arrived leaked into the box. I however found the packaging to be just right, there was an insert that kept the bottle from touching the box, which was good because the mail deliverer had been rough with the box. I have made this my new detergent, as I love how well it cleans.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Leach

customer_reviews.title: i choose this over tide
customer_reviews.text: if you got heavy duty and you use blue tide, this is powerful as well. smell is better to me. its purfumed so if you dont like smelling a scent on clothing , do not buy this brand. this i use for heavy duty washes of pretty stinky sweaty clothing. i found out about this from samples i received years ago. ever since ive been buying at walmart. now i can get on Amazon , bottles were smaller than im used to but i received the two and was still very happy about the pricing.
customer_reviews.author: inspire naturally

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: I really love Persil. I use this to clean me and my husbands coveralls. I have never had a laundry detergent actually get oil out of anything. I have always had to pre-soak them before washing. I used Persil without pre-soaking our coveralls and it not only got the stains out it also got the smell of fuel out. Thats pretty good. Fuel is a very strong smell. I also started using these for our ACU's and it works great. I love it. Totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel62014

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: A friend told me about this brand. Once I tried it, nothing else even compares! We use the sensitive skin one for towels, sheets and for my husband's clothing since he has sensitive skin. The product for the sensitive skin is thick and slightly opaque. Not thin and runny like most brands. You do not need to use a lot to do the job. Read the label for amount to use. I use the fragranced Persil for my own clothing. Smells so good and fresh with out being overly strong. My closet even has a clean scent. Cleans very well, but is kind to your clothes!
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Leaking bottles inside the box
customer_reviews.text: Open the package and both of the bottles had been leaking soaked soaked on the cardboard in the inside of the box both lids were taped but they were loose and leaking don’t know how much product I lost won’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done right!
customer_reviews.text: I have two athletes, a coach, and 3 dogs in my house. This is the best clean on the market, and Amazon has a great price. I use less than the recommended amount in the wash in addition to a vinegar rinse with every load. Perfect results every time!
customer_reviews.author: walter cintron

customer_reviews.title: Great for reducing laundry odors
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to laundry detergent. Before switching to this, I was dealing with clothes smelling like mildew from my washer, body odor smells not washing out of Mens work clothes, and the old detergent not fully washing out of the laundry loads. This detergent has really helped with reducing the mildew smells and body odor smells. In fact, when I ran out of this and switched to a different brand I had on hand, I instantly noticed the laundry not smelling as fresh and clean as when I use persil.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J.

customer_reviews.title: Prepare for a mess...
customer_reviews.text: Just frusturating to deal with this mess! Good product, but shipping detergent is tricky!
customer_reviews.author: Nik C

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE MILDEW SMELL! ♡
customer_reviews.text: Best detergent I've ever used! Seems to prohibit that terrible mildew smell when you accidentally leave your laundry in the washer overnight. Has great cleaning power. Doesn't bother our allergy ridden dog's skin or breathing. Scent is even better once the laundry is in wash mode and after.♡♡♡
customer_reviews.author: VogueReview

customer_reviews.title: This is a great detergent. Smells nice and does a great job ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great detergent. Smells nice and does a great job actually cleaning and getting out stains. I did have some issues with initially as I was filling the detergent dispenser in my front loader to the same low level as with other detergents I have used. This caused some issues with excessive suds during the spin/rinse cycles. I cut back on the amount I was using and everything returned to normal. It still gets the clothes clean and smelling nice.
customer_reviews.author: ghstrider2011

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: No laughing now. I heard Martha Stewart say how wonderful this laundry soap is. Went looking for it and could not find it locally. Amazon to the rescue. Oh my gosh this works even better than I had hoped. Clothes are cleaner, softer. I do not use fabric softener ever. Toss the clothes in the dryer with wool dryer balls and tada! This is so worth trying.
customer_reviews.author: MomsTara

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent, wrapped for no mess delivery
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite detergent. It really cleans everything really well. I have gotten probably 3 great deals for Persil through Amazon. The first 2 were messy deliveries. The lid was jostled just enough to open in transit and leak a bit inside the box. Thankful, it’s didn’t make a huge mess. I gambled this time around and made an order because it was such a great deal. This time the bottles were each wrapped in a bag. No leaks, no mess. Super pleased all around.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Windey

customer_reviews.title: I am not 100% this is Persil. I do ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not 100% this is Persil. I do washing daily with this soap.. Its VERY CLOSE THOUGH....There is something slightly off with this. I could be wrong. I will wash and update soon. Day 2, sever headaches after using this product, in the store I buy weekly and never had this issue before. I believe that this is a counterfeit product and will report to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ann Wiley

customer_reviews.title: need better packaging
customer_reviews.text: plastic around cap was broken and leaked throughout box. made a huge mess
customer_reviews.author: Yolo

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent
customer_reviews.text: I tried Persil as a replacement to my normal detergent (arm and hammer), as I noticed it wasn’t getting the job done getting sweat stains and smell out of my children’s and my clothes. This detergent definitely gets the job done and exceeded my expectations. My clothes always come out bright and vibrant and smelling fresh no matter what, especially our athletic wear. Definitely glad I made the switch, I’ve been able to get more then the 96 approximate loads it says the bottle will yield.
customer_reviews.author: Derek M

customer_reviews.title: The BEST detergent on the market
customer_reviews.text: This product is literally a life saver! I am a mom of 5 kids, 3 dogs, and a rabbit and I use this product as labeled for laundry BUT, I also use it for cleaning the dog cages, house hold chores, and even the coolers we take to the beach! The formula is concentrated so a little bit goes a long way, the smell is AMAZING, and this bottle will last my family about a month! You will not be disappointed and you will have compliments on how nice your home and clothes smell! Go look up the reviews and get yourself a bottle or two!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Hurt

customer_reviews.title: Great product using minimum amount.
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy two at a time and they last over a year for a family of two. I followed the directions and use much less than with any other product, thus getting a great value. The clothes and bedding smell very fresh using the original product. It is impressive how Persil cleans stains and each time a stain will reduce to virtually nothing. An older person may want to place some in a smaller container for easier use.
customer_reviews.author: Skip Wood

customer_reviews.title: Evetho its cost a little more...it works!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is an assistant meat market manager which his white lab coat gets so much blood on them. I apply percil to much of the blood stain as possible,(which can be expensive)but allowing them to soak over night with a little bleach,wash on white cycle and the results are just wonderful. I do this 3 to 4 times a week. His lab coat stands out from the other workers...the co worker talks behind his back that he dont do any meat handling. They actually see what he looks like at the end of day...😊
customer_reviews.author: Gera

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: I have been using DIY detergent in cold water and some stuff just doesn't get clean. With this, I can add a little to the stain or collar, or a little to soak water and most all the stains have come out. Dried blood that has gone thru the dryer, rust, or mildew are the only ones I haven't been able to remove. I personally don't like the smell very much, it is standable, but too strong.
customer_reviews.author: NotFooled

customer_reviews.title: Hands down best soap
customer_reviews.text: This is the best brand of detergent in my opinion I’ve tried gain, tide, so on and nothing compares to how good persil works in both cleaning, not fading, and just over taking out stains. Once I switched over I haven’t even considered going back to another brand. Try it for yourself and see how much better laundry day is with a cup of persil. As for shipping, item was packed in a box, bubble wrap pile towards cap end, item arrived in good shape no leaks in a sealed plastic bag. Box looked beat up but no damage to jug and zero spillage. Nicely done amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: was SO excited to see this is FINALLY in the US
customer_reviews.text: about a year ago or so, I saw Persil was in the US! I loved using it overseas and nothing here compared. I bought some, realized it was the SAME great quality and as soon as I saw it on Amazon I subscribed to keep buying more, this stuff is the BEST, gets whites whiter, colors are safe and it gets everything nice and suuuuuper clean. love this
customer_reviews.author: Chocjedi

customer_reviews.title: Very effective , nice scent
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because all my friends raved about it and I wanted to try it! I loved the smell and the freshness of the clothes after! It washed really well and took out MOST stains (my kids make big stains for some reason!). However, I found the prices to be cheaper in store than what I paid so I was a little disappointed since it said they were on a big sale. I honestly thought they were the bigger format. However, I didn’t overpay by that much and the freshness was worth it to me, I’ll just know for next time!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: scent is too strong ,but it cleans well
customer_reviews.text: I like the cleaning power of persil. But having said that, I really hate the strong scent. I usually buy gain,so I like scented detergent a lot,but this intensive formula smells so strong that I had to rewash my pillows with another detergent twice to get the overpowering smell of Persil out. The intensive clean is definitely only for you if you like laundry that is scented stronger than gain. I wish they had a more natural scented version of Persil.Way stronger scented than regular Persil
customer_reviews.author: Consumer01

customer_reviews.title: SPILLED IN THE BOX
customer_reviews.text: this product is amazing for the clothes but I was more disappointed in the delivery of the package it was spilled inside the and they were also turned over if you can see it in the box in my picture a bit of advice make sure the lids are tightened before it is delivered!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dee H.

customer_reviews.title: Totally awesome. And it doesn’t stink.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this brand because it had the best rating by Consumer Reports. And I’m quite glad that I bought it. After just one wash, my clothes were noticeably brighter and softer than they had been with Tide and Clorox 2. And best of all, my clothes don’t stink anymore from all of the perfumes that are in other laundry detergents. It’s ridiculously hard to find products anymore that don’t reek of perfume. Thank goodness for Persil.
customer_reviews.author: Brian in Alaska

customer_reviews.title: Persil Pearls was amazing. This stuff kinda smells like vomit.
customer_reviews.text: Persil pearls was the best detergent on the market, but it appears to be discontinued. This product, the blue liquid, seems to leave something on the clothes and the scent is kind of like vomit. I have no idea who these people are that are calling it “heavenly”. The old detergent left things crisp and clean and smelling fresh. This leaves clothes feeling funky and smelling faintly like vomit.
customer_reviews.author: Winters

customer_reviews.title: Another leaking shipment
customer_reviews.text: 2nd try = second leaking shipment.. How can no one at Amazon or where it ships from not fix this. I see many others with same problem, if nothing else it has to be costing Amazon and sellers alot of money. This time it didn't even make it to me, after being out for delivery all of a sudden it is undeliverable after "minor damage." But I got two of the 100oz size at a great deal so trying again till they get it right. I'll say this for Amazon no problem extending the deal I got to the replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Tampa8

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Finding Persil in this size and at this price point was a no-brainier purchase for me. Item arrived on time with no leaks or damages. It's not a counterfeit item by any means - the detergent isn't watered down and has an amazing smell once added to the washer. I'll purchase this item again from this seller the moment this bottle runs out! I'm super satisfied with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Shayzee

customer_reviews.title: I loved Wisk and this is a good replacment
customer_reviews.text: I was a Wisk fan but it has been discontinued. I read all the reviews and this was highly rated. It does a good job of getting out stains. I wish it was unscented. It does have a fairly strong smell. I am sure it is full of nasty chemicals that are not good for the environment but I have yet to find an environmental detergent that did a great job cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Love it but where is the autodelivery?  Please bring it back!
customer_reviews.text: I love the sensitive formula. It cleans great and doesn't bother our allergies. It smells when you put it in the dryer but the smell is gone when it is dry. I use between half or all of the narrow part of the cap, depending on the size and the dirt level of the load. But there is a big problem with this item. WHERE IS THE AUTODELIVERY PEOPLE ARE TALKING ABOUT? Please bring it back!!!
customer_reviews.author: Boston Lesbian

customer_reviews.title: Persil detergent.
customer_reviews.text: Persil if your not familiar with this product is made in Germany. I used this product while serving with the US Army to clean my fatigues. Fantastic product. You don’t need a lot of this detergent. A small amount will do. I takes out most of the dirt and grime that my uniform could withstand. Try this product at least once. You’ll be satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Terry McAdams

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I wash all my clothes in it. Great for workout clothes and football gear because the fresh scent breaks through and it cleans well. The amount you get lasts for a long time too. I buy it three times a year...that's it. And believe me I was a shit tom of clothes EVERY weekend.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the hype!
customer_reviews.text: I had never heard of this detergent but saw all the rave reviews, and once again—Amazon does not disappoint!! This stuff smells AMAZING!!! I will never go back to any other brand. Thanks for introducing me to such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: MissTexas

customer_reviews.title: Persil liquid laundry detergent LEAKED in transit
customer_reviews.text: I dislike having 3 inches of the Persil detergent leak all over the other items I purchased. Looking at my order on Amazon 3 weeks to a month in delays had foolish excuses for the delay. The reason I ordered Persil was the good things strangers and friends said about the product. I don't see it, it's no wonder liquid detergent. This won't happen twice.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen the name grow in popularity over the last few years and be offered more widely. It’s great to see works well and preserves my clothes color. HE washer no issues. Great for sensitive skin no irritation. It does have a mild pleasant scent but be mindful of that if sensitive to smell or scent ingredients when purchasing
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm42

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Goods
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived damaged. All the detergent leaked out and container was empty
customer_reviews.author: Boyd S.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived In Great Condition
customer_reviews.text: The product was packaged nicely, no problems with damage or leaking. I purchased for the fragrance free aspect, like that a lot. For some reason, I didn't find it to clean some stains as well as the ORIGINAL although I'm told it is the same formula without fragrance or die. It is a product I use on sheets and towels, great for sensitive skin. If you have any stains, it may or may not work as well as Original Persil. Watered down a bit, I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: "Cal"

customer_reviews.title: First time I tried these - I love it
customer_reviews.text: I was worried I might not like these, but it does a good job of cleaning and I like the scent. There were a lot of online comments about how strong the scent was so i was hesitant about buying them. I don't know what people are complaining about. There's definitely a strong scent but it's not overwhelming at all. I really liked it and I would buy it again the next time it goes on sale.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Smell Buster
customer_reviews.text: My son works at a pizza shop, and his clithes can get to smell like old vomit from the yeast and other ingredients. Persil is the ONLY detergent I have found to get the smell out, even the items I had previously washed with other detergents. Yet, scent is not overpowering or too flowery for men.
customer_reviews.author: EileenV

customer_reviews.title: Great products persil is THE BEST yes better than tide! By a landslide!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this stuff smells great and cleans very very well. This is my new go-to detergent UPDATE: have been using persil original for about a year and still will use nothing else but my husband has sensitive skin so I always wash separately and always disappointed in sensitive detergents I’ve tried. So I thought I’d give persil’s sensitive a try on his clothes and I love it! Works as good as original just free and clear! I only ever use the recommended amount and get great results. With other brands I’ve had to double or triple the dose. NEVER with persil. I love persil with a passion and highly recommend any of their liquid products!
customer_reviews.author: Josh b.

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent, huge mess at delivery.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this detergent, it does a great job on my gym clothes and towels especially. I was extremely disappointed with the huge disaster of a mess it caused for my mail lady and my garage. I ordered two, and as other reviews mentioned- one leaked everywhere. A piece of tape around the screw on lid would fix this issue and a ton of headache. I assumed since there were so many reviews regarding this issue, it would have been handled by now. Amazon credited my one that leaked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged upon receipt!!! Unable to use product!!!
customer_reviews.text: My order cam bundled with another product that I have on auto-ship. Both bottles were leaking to the degree that most of it was wasted in the box which had seeped through onto the other item in the bundled delivery. It was horrible. I simply dropped the items in the trash can. It was to much to try to clean up / salvage. Had I opened the package in the house vs the garage, I would have had a major mess to clean. I'm giving the product 1 star because it smelled good! I was not able to use the product.
customer_reviews.author: MMG

customer_reviews.title: Changed brands and very happy I did, this is great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I had to stop buying Tide as whatever they have done to the formula no longer gets clothes clean. Also, I was beginning to notice that clothes would come out still reeking of sweat/dirty laundry. I tried Persil on the suggestion of a friend and it is amazing stuff. It smells so nice and most stains do not need any prewash treatment. I wish they could bring down the price a bit and that is the only complaint. Our laundry finally looks great and smells great too. I'm a complete convert and will never buy anything else as long as the quality remains as it is.
customer_reviews.author: Coghan

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Detergent and great scent
customer_reviews.text: I truly love Persil detergent. I purchased this with an offer so I got two for the price of one. The scent I ordered was deep clean, which is not an overpowering scent, my clothes and towels smell very fresh and clean. It does not take a because it is very concentrated and thick and it cleans your laundry very well. The packaging was very good and secure and no damage to the product after opening. I recommend this detergent.
customer_reviews.author: ShunShyne

customer_reviews.title: Works great however shipping method left a huge mess
customer_reviews.text: Product works great however arrived with 1/4 of the detergent from both bottles, spilled all over the box. The “leak resistant” tape they placed around the cap definitely did not work!
customer_reviews.author: IdxVocals

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Leaking and Not Usable
customer_reviews.text: Needs to ship double boxed to help avoid impact explosion with other heavy boxes, which can really be a mess (see pic) and should not be required to return leaking liquids via UPS. This was 1st time we had this issue; the other 4 shipments were fine. Really like the soap.
customer_reviews.author: ivy

customer_reviews.title: Smell is nice but harsh on my skin
customer_reviews.text: Got this because I heard it was a good detergent and I have skin sensitivity issues when it comes to detergents. It worked well on my clothes and the smell was pleasant but I must have had a reaction to something in the detergent because it broke me out on my underarms and back. I had to switch back to baby detergent which doesn't do a good job getting rid of stains the way this detergent does. Frustrated and back to the drawing board.
customer_reviews.author: EWH

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Detergent
customer_reviews.text: I love Persil and they put a seal over it, so it always arrives in perfect condition and no leakage.
customer_reviews.author: nickers26

customer_reviews.title: arrived leaking!
customer_reviews.text: I love this detergent but will not be buying it from amazon, it arrived in a box that was half wet from the leaking detergent and other items in the same box were soaked too. Target knows to place liquids in the sealed plastic bags to at least contain the leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Mihaela

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: With little ones in the house, stains on clothes happen daily. This detergent works much better than the cheap stuff (Xtra) we had used prior. Also, we’ve not had the “musty” towel smell since using this. We have this delivered monthly on subscribe and save. Only complaint is that the detergent contained leak a little bit with every shipment.
customer_reviews.author: dll1986

customer_reviews.title: Won't use any another detergent!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a few months now, and I am sold on this detergent. I have had items with pen or food stains for ages that "suddenly" went away after using Persil. My go-to from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Jade Charie

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this detergent. It has an amazing smell to it that lasts quite awhile on your clothing. Not a perfume smell just a clean clothing smell. A little goes a long way and it cleans so well!
customer_reviews.author: SavannahDonna

customer_reviews.title: Best Detergent
customer_reviews.text: Cleans like none other and the scent is better than any other detergent I have ever smelled!!!!! I only bought it because a doctor I know always smells soooo good, and he said its his detergent, sure enough, now I smell pretty like him!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rene' O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!! My new detergent.
customer_reviews.text: Finally found my laundry detergent. I have to say I am impressed. I really thought I was going to end up not liking it. However I absolutely love it!! It smells sooo good! My clothes came out smelling so fresh and clean. I was waiting to open the washer door to a funky smell that lingers in my washer that no other detergent seems to get out of my clothes. Instead the smell was amazing, and my clothes didn't smell like funky washer.. I'm so happy. Now if I could just figure out how to get the funk out of my front load washer. It would probably smell even better.
customer_reviews.author: person

customer_reviews.title: Amazing as I remember when I was a kid...
customer_reviews.text: I have grown up in Europe with my mother using this product (powder version) to wash laundry. This is still amazing and one of the best laundry detergent on the market. No wonder it was chosen #1 laundry detergent on the market in US within the first year of being on the market. All the cloths get washes so much better than the other detergents can clean them, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: I really don't like it very much but will use what I bought
customer_reviews.text: The odor is very strong, cloying and impossible to rinse from clothes. The detergent seems harsh so I only use it for towels, jeans and never anything delicate. It does get my items clean but I can't get past the overpowering smell. I really don't like it very much but will use what I bought.
customer_reviews.author: ganendal

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning agent
customer_reviews.text: Great cleaning with no stinky smells attached. I feel like my clothes actually get clean rather than just smell fresh. This has pulled out some stains that I thought were for sure permanent. Signed up for automatic delivery because I’m so pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kealafly

customer_reviews.title: Best option out there
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with Persil a few years ago after I bought it on a whim when I was tired of Tide not really cutting it anymore. It just worked so much better and suds up so well. We switched to the sensitive version for my child about 2 years ago and haven't looked back. I only could find the sensitive at Walmart and they seemed to stop caring it or maybe because Covid things were hard to find so lately I've been making due with other brands that just aren't cutting it. I was worried about buying it online because of shipping but it shipped just fine. Gonna put it on Auto-ship because it's that good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good laundry soap. My favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I like this laundry soap. It cleans well and has a nice scent. I used to use Tide but now I use this instead.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Roulette

customer_reviews.title: Best Laundry Detergent There Is...
customer_reviews.text: This is the only detergent that consistently gets my clothes looking fresh and clean. The whites are whiter and the colored clothes look less faded after multiple washes. My own personal experience has been confirmed by Consumer Reports, who also rate this laundry detergent as best overall.
customer_reviews.author: AKP

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as Tide with one Difference
customer_reviews.text: Former Tide user; gave this product a try a year ago and have used ever since. This detergent is high quality just like Tide, however, Persil makes my cotton towels NOTICIBLY soft and plush unlike Tide. In fairness, the Persil is used with Downey softener, but never noticed the softness until switching to this product.
customer_reviews.author: GS-Tennessee

customer_reviews.title: Best we've used.
customer_reviews.text: We wash all kinds of clothes with very different degrees of soil. This is the best detergent we have ever used. Been using it for about 3 years. Great product. Cleans very well with nice fresh scent. Not a cover up smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, but this is the second time it came leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Prignano

customer_reviews.title: Delightful smell!
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this detergent on my recent vacation to Ireland. When I returned home and smelled the items that had been washed with it, a flood of fantastic memories came to me. So I knew that i needed to order it. This product does not disappoint! I read previous reviews about leakage in the packaging, so I was expecting the worst. I has pleasantly surprised to see gripper tape around the neck of the bottle, to eliminate leakage. There was not leakage!!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent
customer_reviews.text: This is the best detergent I have ever used. Wife and daughter swear by it. Cleans and smells wonderful. Only problem is that Amazon has a VERY HARD time delivering this item undamaged. 3 of the last 4 deliveries I have ordered came in with the bottle leaking. Got so bad I stopped buying it from Amazon and get it at the local grocery now
customer_reviews.author: C Burris

customer_reviews.title: Serious leaking in package
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this detergent for use in high efficiency washers, but the packaging needs some attention paid to it. I received two containers recently on Subscribe and Save and both had leaked a couple of ounces into the plastic wrap packaging - just seems like the lids were not tight enough. Come on, manufacturer, you can do better than this.
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: Works well on organic and greasy stains!
customer_reviews.text: I go back and forth between if Persil or Tide is better, so I will say either one works great. The Persil has a slightly lighter, fresher scent, but that is totally subjective. Persil does well with organic and greasy stains, and I think it may have an edge in cold water. I have purchased this detergent quite a few times before, and will be buying it in the future!!
customer_reviews.author: Roget

customer_reviews.title: This is best of all laundry detergent I have tried
customer_reviews.text: This does my laundry perfectly. I use just a little less than required and can depend on it all rinsing out. My clothing releases wrinkles easily and smells clean, not perfumy. Sheets billow soft and fresh, towels plump up, and pre-treatment gets the stains.
customer_reviews.author: Morrigan In Oregon

customer_reviews.title: The best I've used - summer workout clothes (and yard work clothes) come out fresh and stain free.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite detergent for major cleaning. I started using it after reading detergent reviews in Consumer Reports and this was rated #1. I agree with their reviews....my only wish is that they offered a fragrance free option in this exact same formula. If that comes available, I will give it 5 stars for sure.
customer_reviews.author: SWS

customer_reviews.title: Arrived all soapy and sticky
customer_reviews.text: Even though the tops were taped up, the detergent leaked out and I had to wash off the outside of the bottles. Quite a bit of the liquid leaked out especially in one bottle. I have arthritis in my knees and can't get to the store often like I want to. Therefore, being able to order things like this on-line through Amazon is very important to me. This was a very disappointing experience.
customer_reviews.author: MfromKY

customer_reviews.title: Cleans very well but
customer_reviews.text: It cleans very well all the dirt out from tough garments such as socks or jeans. One of the best cleaning power I have ever seen so far. However, I suspect this may irritate sensitive skin (from my own experiences).I avoided using this when cleaning under wares and kids clothes. Only for socks or tough garments.
customer_reviews.author: Cecil

customer_reviews.title: Leaky bottle
customer_reviews.text: I began using this detergent about 2 years ago and it quickly became my daily brand. The only issue, with this particular bottle, is that it leaked in the plastic bag. I basically paid for a half-full bottle. I always order my detergent online and this is the first leaking incident I've encountered.
customer_reviews.author: Noaitall

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, finally doesn't leak during shipping
customer_reviews.text: Amazon has better deals than the grocery store, it's that simple. And now that it ships with a way better leak shield and soap doesn't get in the box and on my other mail, no reason not to order from Amazon. This detergent smells great, and you really only need a small amount per wash - everything holds the scent well too, smells clean while you wear it!
customer_reviews.author: Julie S

customer_reviews.title: Great product/fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't leak in shopping. Love this detergent! Bye bye tide.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Works great without scent!
customer_reviews.text: That said, I use some essential oils with mine because those don't bother me like typical detergent scents do. Even without scent, it's very good at freshening and making your clothes smell great. Persil is always a league above other laundry detergents in all ways. Don't let the "economy" price fool you.
customer_reviews.author: Acacia Grey

customer_reviews.title: Better than most
customer_reviews.text: Very good clothes detergent. Unfortunately, though, every shipment I've received from Amazon has arrived damaged. (They did replace the most recent one which was beyond salvage and delivered by USPS in added rubbish bags. Amazon simply doesn't pack heavy liquids adequately and I won't be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Casowitz

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We have softened water, so only need to use a very small amount of this. I believe it replaced Wisk, which was our long-time laundry detergent, so was happy to find this. I have used less expensive brands, but they didn't seem to do the cleaning job that Persil does, using a smaller amount.
customer_reviews.author: lheilpluke

customer_reviews.title: Best on market ,beats tide
customer_reviews.text: Did experiment with everything on the market. I had my son buy1 of everything. The results were persil, woolite and drift. I was upset because I used tide for a couple of decades. It changed. Persil won after 2months on those 3. Everything stayed brighter. I liked having it delivered. Cap was tight.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Smells Weird
customer_reviews.text: It does seem to get the clothes clean but I think it smells kind of weird. It has kind of a strong chemical cleaner smell that I don't much care for. I have reserved this for my husband's barn and workout clothes and the blankets that our dogs lay on and stink up. I keep it far away from my clothes and my kids clothes because I don't want to have to smell like Persil detergent all day.
customer_reviews.author: Karate4566

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but received a mess
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great. The detergent smells good and leaves your clothes very fresh and clean. My only reason for a less than perfect review is due to receiving the product damaged. I received my delivery and one bottle cap had detergent leaking all over and it was a big mess. It’s not convenient to exchange the damaged product.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Best detergent around
customer_reviews.text: I recently had to buy a new washing machine and wanted a detergent, a good detergent, that was safe and good for my clothes and machine. I did some research online and Persil stood above the others. The funny thing is I've never heard of Persil, but I gave it a try. Right from the first load I was "Yeah, this is the best detergent!". Noticeably cleaner clothes, and I love the scent. Trust me, you'll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: SkyCloud

customer_reviews.title: Did not meet expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed as this brand was highly recommended by several good friends. I do not like the fragrance, felt like it makes clothes stiff and dull. I tried reducing the amount bad I was thinking I was using too much but was not much better. Does clean well but did not like the results.
customer_reviews.author: ZeldaMc

customer_reviews.title: Great. It removes oil from work clothes by using ...
customer_reviews.text: Great. It removes oil from work clothes by using hot water. It even works in cold water but better using hot water.
customer_reviews.author: billie

product_meta.title: Persil ProClean Power-Liquid Laundry Detergent, Sensitive Skin, 100 Fluid Ounces, 64 Loads
product_meta.description: Scent Name:Sensitive Skin| Size:100 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)For those with sensitive skin, Persil Power-Liquid Sensitive Skin detergent gives you the cleaning power of our Original detergent in a hypoallergenic formula. It's 100% dye-free and perfume-free and dermatologist-tested. And it's formulated to deliver an exceptional deep clean, which makes it great for everyday laundry and to help fight tough stains. With Sensitive Skin Power-Liquid detergent from Persil, you'll get exceptionally clean clothes without scents and perfumes that can aggravate skin sensitivities. While gentle on skin, Persil Power-Liquid Sensitive Skin remains tough on stains so still get an exceptional deep clean. Persil Power-Liquid laundry detergent works in all washing machines, including HE and cleans effectively in all water temperatures. This package includes one 100-fluid-ounce bottle of Persil ProClean Sensitive Skin liquid laundry detergent, enough for 64 loads.
feature_bullets: Gentle on skin: dye-free, perfume-free and dermatologist tested
Powerful stain-fighting for an exceptional deep clean
Great for everyday laundry and to fight tough stains. Measuring - for regular loads, fill cap to 46.1 ml
Persil ProClean laundry detergents have been optimized for great performance in all types of machines, including HE
This package includes one 100-fluid-ounce bottle of Persil ProClean Sensitive Skin liquid laundry detergent, enough for 64 loads.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
